abstract: UBS, the biggest money manager for the wealthy, widened its lead over Citigroup and Merrill Lynch last year as rising stock markets attracted new funds, according to consulting firm Scorpio Partnership.
lead_paragraph: UBS, the biggest money manager for the wealthy, widened its lead over Citigroup and Merrill Lynch last year as rising stock markets attracted new funds, according to consulting firm Scorpio Partnership.

headline.main: In Managing Money for the Rich, UBS Comes Out on Top
